en: The second night I dreamed that I was on a desert island and Sonia , our golden retriever , was with me .
baseline: 第二天晚上,我梦见我在沙漠岛上,我们的金猎人索尼亚和我在一起。

en: Try to deal with the past .
Most people would say it started with the Fireflies , but they 'd be wrong .
baseline: 大多数人会说它从火花开始,但他们会错了。

en: For me , it began with Robert Paglino .
baseline: 对我来说,它从罗伯特·帕格林诺开始。
zh: 对我来说,它开始于罗伯特·帕格林诺.

en: So although both of us could have been repaired , only one of us had been .
baseline: 因此,虽然我们两个都能够得到修理,但只有我们一个人已经得到修理。

en: Even if he had n't been my best friend , I should at least have empathized .
baseline: 即使他不是我最好的朋友,我至少应该同情他。

en: Two of the enemy twitched at my feet .
baseline: 两个敌人在我脚边颤抖。

en: Blood coursed unheeded from his nose and splattered down his shirt .
baseline: 血从他鼻子里流出,洒在衬衫上。
